messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Summarize all smartphones released by Google between January 2022 and July 2025 (including January 2022 and July 2025). Include the following details: device name, available colors, announced date, RAM, U.S. launch price ($), materials, size, OS, battery capacity.

Present the data in one Markdown table with columns: Device, Available colors, Announced date, RAM, U.S. launch price (MSRP by storage), Materials (frame / front & back), Size (H × W × D; mm), Launch OS, Battery capacity.

Notes:
Specify different prices for varying storage tiers using Google’s initial MSRP in USD. And please list all available colors per model. For foldable phones, the dimensions column must include two specifications: unfolded dimensions and folded dimensions.

Formatting Rules:
Available colors: separated by commas
Announced date: yyyy-mm-dd
RAM: number GB, e.g., 2 GB
U.S. launch price: If there are more than one storage editions, use comma to separate them, such as 128 GB: 300, 256 GB: 500.
Materials: frame's material / material A front, B back. e.g., steel / GG Victus 2 front, metal back. If the material of front and back is the same one, you can write as  metal / glass front & back.
Battery capacity: xxx mAh.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

<think>
To generate this table, I need to gather information on each smartphone released by Google within the specified period. Since I don't have this information readily available, I'll need to search for it.
</think>

<search>Google smartphones released between January 2022 and July 2025</search>

Search query: Google smartphones released between January 2022 and July 2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.ign.com/articles/every-google-pixel-phone-release-date-in-order):
Every Google Pixel Generation: A Full History of Release Dates - IGN The Google Pixel 6a launched later than most other a models, arriving in late July 2022. This smartphone cut the 90Hz refresh rate of Google ...

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Google_Pixel):
Google Pixel - Wikipedia Google launched the Pixel 10 at the 2025 Made by Google event, alongside the Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL and Pixel 10 Pro Fold. Display: 6.3" Actua ...

[Doc 3](https://www.augustman.com/in/gear/tech/google-pixel-phones-in-order-of-chronological-release/):
All Google Pixel Smartphones In Order Of Chronology - AugustMan With eight generations of Google Pixel smartphones behind us, let us take a closer look at them and their chronological order of release.

Search query: Google Pixel 7a release date and specs
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.gsmarena.com/google_pixel_7a-12170.php):
Google Pixel 7a - Full phone specifications - GSMArena.com Google Pixel 7a · Released 2023, May 10 · 193.5g, 9mm thickness · Android 13, up to 16 · 128GB storage, no card slot.

[Doc 3](https://www.phonearena.com/phones/Google-Pixel-7a_id12071):
Google Pixel 7a Full Specifications - PhoneArena Google Pixel 7a · Released · May 10, 2023 · 6.1-inch · 2400x1080px · Dual camera · 4385 mAh · 8GB · 128GB · Google Tensor G2 · Android 15.

Search query: Google Pixel 6a release date and specs
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pixel_6a):
Pixel 6a - Wikipedia The device was announced on May 11, 2022 as part of Google I/O's keynote speech. Pixel ...

[Doc 2](https://www.gsmarena.com/google_pixel_6a-11229.php):
Google Pixel 6a - Full phone specifications - GSMArena.com Google Pixel 6a · Released 2022, July 21 · 178g, 8.9mm thickness · Android 12, up to 16 · 128GB storage, no card slot.

[Doc 3](https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/tech/google-pixel-6a-price-release-date-specs-features):
Google Pixel 6a Price, Release Date, Specs, Features The Pixel 6a will start at $450 when it becomes available for preorder starting on July 21 on Google's online store. It will be fully released and available to ...

Based on these searches, I've gathered essential details about the Pixel 6a and Pixel 7a but still need to check for more releases between 2022 and 2025.
</think>

<search>Google Pixel 8 release date and specs</search>

Result: [Doc 1](https://www.gsmarena.com/google_pixel_8-12546.php):
Google Pixel 8 - Full phone specifications Google Pixel 8 · Released 2023, October 12 · 187g, 8.9mm thickness · Android 14, up to 16 · 128GB/256GB storage, no card slot.

Pixel 8 The Pixel 8 and Pixel 8 Pro were officially announced on October 4, 2023, at the annual Made by Google event and were released in the United States on October ...
